comment: Shows alternation with the alomorph -ni:, which appears suffixed to verbs with a word final vowel..
Shows alternation with the alomorph -ni:, which appears suffixed to nouns with a word final vowel.
'ʔanta' is in fact the 2sgM form, 'ʔanti' is the 2sgF form.
'ʔanta' is in fact the 2sgM form, 'ʔanti' is the 2sgF form.
'ʔantum' is in fact the 2dM form, the 2dF form is 'ʔntunna'.
'ʔantum' is in fact the 2dM form, the 2dF form is 'ʔntunna'.
